abilities.name: Electric Swamp
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is in your hand and you have at least 4 Lightning Energy cards in play, you may play this Pokémon onto your Bench. If you do, move any number of Lightning Energy from your other Pokémon to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hover Over
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
